footer.tagline: Aniwahwɛ Lasik yareɛ a yɛde mfidie foforɔ a ɛwɔ nyinaa mu yɛ adwuma ma adwuma no yɛ papa.

header.title: Yɛn Nnwuma
header.subtitle: Anihwɛ a yɛde mfidie foforɔ yɛ sɛdeɛ ɛfata wo

traditional.title: LASIK Atetesɛm
traditional.description: LASIK Atetesɛm yɛ yɛn anihwɛ a yɛde laser yɛ a ɛaboa nnipa mpempem wɔ wiase nyinaa ama wɔatumi agyae nkataaniwa ne ahwehwɛaniwa yi.
traditional.how_works_title: Ɛkwan a Ɛfa So Yɛ Adwuma
traditional.how_works_text: Sɛ yɛreyɛ LASIK Atetesɛm no, yɛn ɔyaresafoɔ de microkeratome (adadeɛ a yɛde yɛ otwam adwuma) bɛyɛ krataa ketewa bi wɔ kornea no so. Afei wɔbɛma krataa no so, na wɔde excimer laser no atwa kornea nsunsuani a ɛwɔ ase no so ama w'aniwa no atumi ahunu adeɛ yie. Akyire no, wɔde krataa no bɛsan ato ne dantabea sɛ akadiɛ bere a ɔyareɛ no resa.
traditional.candidates_text: Wobɛtumi ayɛ obi a LASIK Atetesɛm no fata wo sɛ:

candidates.item2: W'ani ahunu adeɛ papa koraa mfeɛ baako
candidates.item3: Wowɔ ani a ɛnhunu adeɛ a ɛwɔ akyirikyiri, anaa ɛnhunu adeɛ a ɛbɛn, anaa astigmatism a ɛwɔ mfinimfini

traditional.recovery_text: Nnipa dodoɔ no bɛhunu sɛ wɔn ani adɔre nkakrankakra dɔnhwere 24 akyire. Ayaresa mu nyinaa bɛdi nnawɔtwe 1-2, na w'ani bɛhunu adeɛ papa koraa bosome baako mu. LASIK Atetesɛm no wɔ nkunimdie kɛse, bɛyɛ nnipa 96% na wɔhunu adeɛ sɛdeɛ wɔpɛ.

custom.title: LASIK a Yɛyɛ No Wo Nkoaa Sɛnea Ɛbɛfata Wo
custom.description: LASIK a Yɛyɛ No Wo Nkoaa Sɛnea Ɛbɛfata Wo yɛ yɛn LASIK ɔhyɛnsoɔ a yɛde laser nko ara yɛ a ɛma nteaseɛ ne adwuma papa wɔ aniwa mu adwuma paa.
custom.how_works_title: Ɛkwan a Ɛfa So Yɛ Adwuma
custom.how_works_text: Wɔ LASIK a Yɛyɛ No Wo Nkoaa Sɛnea Ɛbɛfata Wo mu no, yɛde laser ahoroɔ mmienu di dwuma: femtosecond laser a yɛde yɛ kornea krataa (a yɛmfa dadea nyɛ), ne wavefront-guided excimer laser a ɛka anim kɔ a yɛde siesie kornea no. Saa laser adwuma yi ma yɛtumi yɛ krataa no pɛpɛɛpɛ ne ayaresa a ɛfata wo kornea mfonini a ɛnne obi de.

benefits.item1: Krataa no yɛ a ɛyɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ
benefits.item2: Ayaresa nhyehyɛe a ɛfata wo aniwa agyinasodeɛ nkoaa
benefits.item3: Ani a ɛhunu adeɛ wɔ anadwo ne hann a ɛhyerɛn mu a ɛsen LASIK Atetesɛm de no
benefits.item4: Tumi a ɛwɔ mu sɛ wɔtumi sa nsunsuansoɔ a ɛkɔ nnipa hunu mu (aniwa mu nsosoɔ)
benefits.item5: Kwan papa a ɛfata nnipa a wɔwɔ kornea tiatia anaa wɔn a wɔn ani ahuna kɛse

custom.right_for_you_title: So LASIK a Yɛyɛ No Wo Nkoaa Sɛnea Ɛbɛfata Wo Fata Wo?
custom.right_for_you_text: Ɛwom sɛ ne boɔ yɛ den kakra sen LASIK Atetesɛm no de, nanso LASIK a Yɛyɛ No Wo Nkoaa Sɛnea Ɛbɛfata Wo fata sɛ wode w'adwene bɛsi so sɛ wowɔ anihunu nsɛm a ɛyɛ den, nsunsuansoɔ a ɛkɔ ɔhyɛn soro, anaa wopɛ mfidie a ɛkɔ anim koraa. Yɛn adɔkotafoɔ bɛhwɛ w'akwannya pɔtee bere a yɛrebɛhwehwɛ wo mu.

prk.title: PRK (Photorefractive Keratectomy)
prk.description: PRK yɛ kwan foforo a ɛfata wɔn a ɛnsɛ sɛ wɔyɛ krataa wɔ wɔn ani so no. PRK ne adwuma a wɔde laser dii kan yɛeɛ wɔ ani mu, na ɛda so ara ma nsosoɔ papa.
prk.how_works_title: Ɛkwan a Ɛfa So Yɛ Adwuma
prk.how_works_text: Wɔ PRK mu no, ɔdɔkota no bɛyi kornea no ho nwoma a ɛwɔ akyiri no (epithelium) sen sɛ ɔbɛyɛ krataa. Na afei wɔde excimer laser no asiesie kornea no ama w'ani ahunu adeɛ. Epithelium no bɛsane anyin nnansa bi akyire.
prk.candidates_text: Yɛbɛtumi akamfo PRK ama nnipa a:

candidates.item1: Wɔwɔ kornea tiatia a ɛnfata LASIK
candidates.item2: Wɔyɛ adwuma anaa wɔwɔ agorɔdie ahodoɔ a ɛbɛtumi ama aniwa mu apira (akofoɔ, akansi agorɔ)
candidates.item4: Wɔayɛ LASIK dada na wɔhia mmoa bio

prk.recovery_text: Ayaresa a ɛfiri PRK mu no fa bere tenten sen LASIK, na ani a ɛhunu adeɛ papa bɛba bɛyɛ abosome 1-3 mu. Nanso, nsosoɔ a ɛwɔ akyirikyiri no te sɛ LASIK de no, na PRK twa krataa mu nsɛm so.

presbyopia.title: Presbyopia Ayaresa
presbyopia.description: Presbyopia yɛ yadeɛ a ɛba mfeɛ a ɛkyere ɛma nnipa pii a wɔadi mfeɛ bɛyɛ 40 anaa ɛboro saa, na ɛma ɛyɛ den sɛ wɔbɛhwɛ nneɛma a ɛbɛn. Wɔ Vision Clarity Institute mu no, yɛwɔ akwan pii a yɛfa so sa presbyopia.
presbyopia.monovision_text: Wɔ saa kwan yi mu no, wɔsiesie ani baako ma ɛhunu adeɛ a ɛwɔ akyirikyiri, na ɛbaako nso hunu adeɛ a ɛbɛn. W'adwene sua sɛ ɛbɛfa ani a ɛfata sɛnea deɛ worehwɛ no teɛ. Yei bɛtumi ama woanhia ahwehwɛaniwa.
presbyopia.multifocal_text: Yɛde laser mfidie foforo redi dwuma no, yɛbɛtumi ayɛ beaeɛ ahodoɔ wɔ wo kornea no so a ɛbɛma woahunu adeɛ pefee wɔ akyirikyiri ahodoɔ so. Saa kwan yi ma nsosoɔ papa ma wɔn a ɛfata.
presbyopia.rle_text: Ɛfata nnipa bi, nkanka wɔn a wɔadi mfeɛ 50 anaa ɛboro saa, sɛ yɛbɛsesa wɔn aniwa mu lens a ɛwɔ hɔ dada no ama lens foforo a ɛhunu adeɛ wɔ beaeɛ ahodoɔ pii. Saa adwuma yi te sɛ cataract adwuma nanso wɔyɛ ansa na cataract bɛba.
presbyopia.determination_title: Sɛnea Yɛbɛhunu Kwan a Ɛfata Wo
presbyopia.determination_text: Bere a yɛrebɛhwehwɛ wo mu no, yɛn mmarima a wɔayɛ adesua pii bɛhwɛ w'anihunu, wɔne wo akasa afa w'asetram ne w'anihunu ahiadeɛ ho, na wɔakyerɛ wo ɔkwan a ɛfata wo presbyopia ayaresa.

cta.title: Woasiesie Wo Ho Sɛ Wobɛhunu Adeɛ a Ɛnhia Ahwehwɛaniwa?
cta.content: Hyehyɛ wo nhwehwɛmu a wo ho mfa hwee ɛnnɛ sɛnea wobɛhunu ani ahwɛyie a ɛfata wo.

consultation.title: Hyehyɛ Nhwehwɛmu
consultation.success: Medaase! Yɛanya wo nhwehwɛmu abisa no. Yɛbɛka wo ntɛm.

inquiry.title: Bisa Nsɛm
inquiry.success: Medaase wɔ wo nsɛmbisa ho. Yɛn kuo bɛgye wo nsɛmmisa no so ɛrenkyɛ.

form.title: Bodin
form.name: Din
form.preferred_contact_time: Bere a Wopɛ sɛ Yɛbɛka Wo
form.consent: Mema kwan sɛ Vision Clarity Institute bɛboaboa nsɛm a makyerɛ wɔ soro ha ano na wɔakora.

service.bladeless_lasik: LASIK a Yɛyɛ No Wo Nkoaa Sɛnea Ɛbɛfata Wo
